data.eml:eml: An advanced, new long-legged bird from the Early Cretaceous of the Jehol Group (northeastern China): insights into the temporal divergence of modern birds

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Di, Chiappe, Luis M., Zhang, Yuguang, Bell, Alyssa, Meng, Qingjin, Ji, Qiang, Wang, Xuri (2014): An advanced, new long-legged bird from the Early Cretaceous of the Jehol Group (northeastern China): insights into the temporal divergence of modern birds. Zootaxa 3884 (3): 253-266, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3884.3.4
